titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in Italian, by the most Reuerend father, Marc' Antony de Dominis, Archb. of Spalato, the first Sunday in Aduent, anno 1617. In the Mercers Chappel in London, to the Italians in that city, and many other honorable auditors then assembled. Vpon the 12. verse of the 13. chapter to the Romanes, being part of the Epistle for that day. First published in Italian by the author, and thereout translated into English
Predica fatta da Monsr. Marc' Antonio de Dominis, Arcivo. di Spalato. English
titleStmt.author: De Dominis, Marco Antonio, 1560-1624.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Predica fatta da Monsr. Marc' Antonio de Dominis, Arcivo. di Spalato.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A" and a woodcut; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
